    x=le.fit_transform(x)
    return x

lasso_pipeline = Pipeline([("scaler", StandardScaler()), ("lasso_regressor", Lasso(random_state = 42))])
random_forest_pipeline = Pipeline([("scaler", StandardScaler()), ("randomforest_regression", RandomForestRegressor(random_state = 42))])
xgboost_pipeline = Pipeline([("scaler", StandardScaler()), ("xgboost_regression", XGBRegressor())])
knn_pipeline = Pipeline([("scaler", StandardScaler()), ("knn_regression", KNeighborsRegressor())])

source.09b681a4: Forecasting of an order has tardiness
source.9a7a2adc: omit all features which have less than +-0.004 correlation with target
source.25ea0c4c: deleting duplicate and not reated features
source.0e2ee9b3:
I use several classifiaction models using also CV to find the best model with best hyper parameter. 
pre-proccessing method is standard scaler
source.5f2204ce: customer ZipCode and Customer state have high correlation with Customer Country. we can omit them and keep only customer country
source.ed575ba8: Central America and Western Europa have the most lated delivered Orders
source.0f0c1abf: 'Delivery Status' should also be omited. it has directly related to the target
source.092a797b: # Top 20 Customers regarding the quanitity of orders
source.2035b301: # Top 20 Customers regarding profit of all orders
source.3597a1b9: Predicting if an order is fraud or not
source.1897eef2: we can consider NaN values as a separte class using LabelEncoder
